mapper.insert: insert into comments (id, replyer, content) values (id_num.nextval, #{replyer}, #{content})
mapper.update: update comments set id = #{content}, updatedate = sysdate where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select count(id) from comments where id = #{id}
mapper.update: update comments set replycnt = replycnt + #{amount} where id = #{id}
